TopicTitle: Mechjeb latest version and dev version Flips rocket during gravity turn and overheats during ascent

Articles.Content: Why dos Mechjeb latest version and dev version Flips rocket during gravity turn and overheats during ascent?And also dos it if i make a Space plane on top of the booster even if i put the 4 delta wings on the bottom of the booster?Why dos it do this i am using KSP 1.0.4.Any help?Thanks for helping.
